description:
Fans of the Tron franchise have been waiting quite some time for the third installment of Disney‘s sci-fi film franchise. Now the third entry, titled Tron: Ares, is scheduled to be released later this year – and Disney has finally released the first official trailer. The Tron films have had a very interesting history. The [...]

The post Disney Releases First ‘Tron: Ares’ Trailer appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Disney Releases First ‘Tron: Ares’ Trailer
